name: MASK
overview: THE BATTLE CONTINUES!!! Join with the forces of MASK, skillfully commanded by the brilliant strategist Matt Trakker, and combat the evil of the villainous VENOM in their quest for domination of the world. No longer need you stand by and passively observer the evil deeds of Mayhem and his co-conspirators. Here is your chance to dig deep into your cunning and put your skills to the test against possibly the greatest master criminal the world has ever seen, fact or fiction. This classic conflict of good versus evil is portrayed with a realism and excitement that can only take its lead from the world's most famous collection of superheroes and supervillains. There are creations of adventure, there are creations of combat, but there is not a creation quite like MASK!!!
